title: Land with House For Sale Near Galle Southern Expressway
location: wanchawala, galle southern expressway road, Galle
details: The property is located in galle wanchavala, just minutes to the galle southern expressway, Peaceful calm area, nowadays this location becoming more demand. The land is 20 perch, the house is approximately 9perch and its 3 floor house, 3rd floor has a cabana, this house is also idle for foreigners, just 1.5km to dewata surfing beach and 3km to unawatuna beach.
